verified.description: True if a twitter user is verified else False

profile_image_url.description: The URL of the twitter user's profile image

id.description: The unique identifier of the tweet

created_at.description: The date and time the tweet was published

username.description: The username of the twitter user

author_id.description: A unique identifier of the twitter user

edit_history_tweet_ids.description: A list of unique identifiers of previous versions of the tweet

location.description: The location of the twitter user

name.description: The name of the twitter user

text.description: The tweet published by the twitter user
